name: Binary Studio Sydney
overview:
Binary is a Sydney based digital studio that creates custom mobile applications, websites and social experiences.

We collaborate with businesses, brands & agencies - providing services to clients in Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide, Canberra, NZ, USA, Hong Kong, Japan, UK and Switzerland.

Our core services can be divided into three areas:

Creative & Design • Website Design & Branding • iPhone Application Design • iPad Application Design • Mobile Application Design • User Interface Design (UI) • User Experience Design (UXD) • Information Architecture (IA) • Social Media & Community Design • Creative / Digital Consultation

Development & Production • Website / Microsite Development • iOS Development (iPhone, iPad & iPod) • Android App Development • Mobile Web Development • Web Applications • Content Management Systems (CMS) • eCommerce Systems / Online Stores

Social & Marketing • Social Media Engagement • Social Campaign Management • Email Marketing • Newsletter Services • Event & RSVP campaigns • Online Media Production
